title.narrative: Arms Trade Treaty Secretariat and Sponsorship Fund

description.narrative: The Arms Trade Treaty (ATT) was adopted by the United Nations General Assembly to regulate international trade in conventional arms by establishing the highest international standards and to prevent and eradicate illicit trade and diversion of conventional arms. Funding under this investment contributes to the costs of the Secretariat of the Arms Trade Treaty and provides a sponsorship program to assist developing countries in engaging with teh Arms Trade Treaty. The total value of this investment is $50,000 to be expensed during the 2014-15 financial year.
